faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about AI Human Video

items.title: Can I choose different presenters for my videos?
items.description: Yes, the platform allows you to select from a variety of avatars and styles to suit your video's needs.

items.title: Is there a limit to how many videos I can generate?
items.description: There’s no limit! You can create as many videos as you need with our flexible pricing plans.

items.title: Can I use these videos for commercial purposes?
items.description: Absolutely! All generated videos can be used for both personal and commercial projects.

items.title: How does the privacy feature work?
items.description: All video generation occurs locally in your browser, meaning your scripts and content remain private and secure.

footer.heading: Ready to Create Stunning Videos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and experience the difference for yourself. No sign-up required.
